insert into t_account_statistics (`month`, hospital_id, invoice_total_money, income, basic_salary, `status`, create_time, update_time) values (#{month,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{invoiceTotalMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{basicSalary,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
